text: Lucien Lebaillif (born 1897, date of death unknown) was a French swimmer. He competed in the men's 200 metre breaststroke and men's 400 metre breaststroke events at the 1920 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1897 births Category:Year of death missing Category:French male swimmers Category:Male breaststroke swimmers Category:Olympic swimmers of France Category:Swimmers at the 1920 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Lucien Lebaillif
